title: Pradoshia
content:
Pradoshia  is a Gram-positive and spore-forming genus of bacteria from the family of Bacillaceae with one known species (Pradoshia eiseniae).[1][3][4] Pradoshia eiseniae is capable to metabolize 3-nitropropionic acid.[4] Pradoshia eiseniae has been isolated from the gut of the earthworm Eisenia fetida.[4]

This Bacillota-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
